executable.title: Registration Metrics
executable.description: Command Line Module for calculating 95% Hausdorff Distance and Dice Similarity Coefficient between two label map images. The module outputs a volumetric image where pixel intensity represents the HD of each pixel, showing the location of maximum error.
executable.contributor: Haytham Elhawary, Ph.D., Surgical Planning Laboratory, Harvard Medical School
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

double.name: dscResult
double.label: Dice similarity coefficient (%)
double.description: Dice similarity coefficient. Between 0 and 100. 100 means perfect match. -1 means not computed.

double.name: hdResult
double.label: Hausdorff distance (mm)
double.description: 95th percentile of the maximum Hausdorff distance, in mm. -1 means not computed.

image.name: DistanceMap
image.label: Output distance map volume
image.description: Output distance map that used for the Hausdorff distance computation
